item.description:
Let's meetup at the fabulous Redfin waterside bar and grill in Stratford. Join us at 4:00 on the deck at the Redfin to get to know each other and then hear some great live music!

The name of the band is "The Shebang" and they play from 5 pm to 8 pm.

We are meeting early as it is expected to get crowded and we will want to have a chance to mingle and talk before the music begins!

Looking forward to seeing you there!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: 40's...Let's Get Together and have Fun!
